title: How a Ukrainian dam played a key role in tensions with Russia | TheHill

content: Shortly after Russias annexation of Crimea in 2014, Ukraine built a concrete dam cutting off 85 percent of the peninsulas water supply. So one of Moscows first strategic moves after invading the coun… [+7998 chars]
